description: Missing or blank processing timestamp.
One or more required applicant fields missing or blank.
Both SSN and IP address missing/blank.
Email missing or blank.
Email does not match expected format.
Gender value requires canonical mapping (M/F to Male/Female).
Gender outside allowed source set.
DOB not in canonical YYYY-MM-DD format.
DOB format is ambiguous NN/NN/YYYY.
Annual income stored as string instead of numeric.
Annual salary provided while annual income missing (field drift).
Credit history months is negative.
Savings balance is negative.
Debt-to-income is outside [0, 1].
Approved loan missing approved_amount and/or interest_rate.
Rejected loan missing rejection_reason.
Loan approved with zero months of credit history.
Loan approved with less than 6 months of credit history.
IP address is private-range (likely masked/synthetic).
Rows with duplicated application_id values.
Distinct application_id keys that are duplicated.
Rows where SSN repeats across one or more records.
Distinct SSN values that appear across different application IDs.
Spending category missing or blank.
Spending amount cannot be parsed as numeric.
Spending amount is negative.
